archimate:Requirement.name: SG.1.1.2d: d) ensure that the information security governance framework is supported by an information security strategy, information security programme, information security assurance programme, and information security management system (ISMS) if required.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
